text: Tajin kachꞌaw na ri Jesús are xaq kꞌa te xopan ri Judas, jun chike ri kabꞌlajuj tijoxelabꞌ, e rachiꞌl sibꞌalaj e kꞌi winaq ri e taqtal bꞌik kumal ri e chꞌawenelabꞌ cho ri Dios pa kiwiꞌ ri winaq, aꞌjtijabꞌ rech ri taqanik xuqujeꞌ e kꞌamal taq bꞌe kech ri winaq aꞌj Israel, kukꞌam cheꞌ rachiꞌl sakꞌibꞌal.
